Text:
@ Gary you're one of my Fav' uploader ...if you could post "Cheer" & "One born every minute -UK" episodes here i'd be very grateful to you!!!! Cheer episodes are here but, no seeds.

Thanks for re-encoding them!!
Hi mate. I am still trying to find them for you. Sorry, been a bit busy with family stuff. I'll see what I can do again tomorrow mate :)
Thank you very much Gaz, your a star !!!

LOL!!! President??!!
Could you imagine Obama watching The Valleys?
That might be one of the reasons we are all screwed!!

Gaz, love this show!
My medicine until Geordie Shore starts again!
Didn't MIC start last night?
Love your uploads of TOWIE :)

MIC did start last night, but, I am not able to do a webrip of it as Channel 4 have gone to a new system to prevent people doing that. I am still on the look out for it, but I might not get it up in the next few hours :( It might take a day or so :( :(

no worries, ill be waiting :)
do you watch Geordie Shore?
you from Australia right?

Yep, I am from Australia. This will shock a few people, but, I don't really watch any of the shows I upload! My favourites are Survivor and Curb Your Enthusiasm and South Park. I started uploading these shows because a friend of mine asked if I could get her TOWIE and MIC. I couldn't find it on Pirate Bay, so when I did elsewhere, I uploaded it here. People started to thank me and I wanted to continue making them happy! The cat is out of the bag!! :)
Awww Gary, you are an Angel, we all love you!!!  Waiting patiently for MIC xxxxx

hahaha! well you listen to requests, you would be the peoples president :P
GIVE THIS MAN A GREEN SKULL. and theres no new episode of the valleys uploaded, i think it aired last night? eztv being slack, show them who's boss :)
Is there any sign of episode 4? Thanks.
